options.name: Free Action : Double Toss
options.description: When you throw a Weapon with an Attack, you can throw an additional Weapon as part of that Action.

options.name: Action : Quick Fire
options.description: If you are behind Partial or Full Cover, you can move 2 Units and use the Attack Action or Channel Action and return to your original position.

options.name: Action : Disengage
options.description: You Move up to your full Movement Speed but do not provoke Reactions.

options.name: Reaction : Covered Retreat
options.description: When a hostile Creature moves within 2 Units of you, you can use your Reaction to Move up to 4 Units and make an Attack with a Ranged or a Throwing Weapon
